Arg1.text: survivability of the organism under thermal stress

0.sentence: A correlation between regulation of trehalose synthesis and survivability of the organism under thermal stress has been established in Candida utilis (Lahiri et al., 2014).
Such variation suggests that these less conserved sites may be responsible for interaction with different regulators or effectors and differentiation of Rab functions.
